titleStmt.title: The Samaritan shewing that many and unnecessary impositions are not the oyl that must heal the church together with the way or means to do it / by a country gentleman who goes to common-prayer and not to meetings.
titleStmt.author: Polhill, Edward, 1622-1694?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Polhill. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
